1226870.name: NOISZ re:||VERSE OST + booklet
1226870.description:
Original tracks from NOISZ's expansion, re:||VERSE. Comes with a PDF lyrics booklet that doubles as a mini artbook! (Available in spoiler and non-spoiler editions.)

1. D.C. al coda (OP edit) / M-Project ft. Mayumi Morinaga
2. Quicksilver / HyuN
3. multiVerse / MonstDeath vs. Neutral Moon
4. re:||VERSE / Camellia ft. chiisana
5. re:||BIRTH / Camellia ft. Mayumi Morinaga
6. D.S. al fine / kors k & Camellia
7. D.C. al coda (Long Version) / M-Project ft. Mayumi Morinaga
8. re:||VERSE (Instrumental) / Camellia
9. re:||BIRTH (Instrumental) / Camellia
1226870.supported_languages: 英语, 日语, 简体中文
